translation:
Our Lord and Illustrious Sir

He is proceeding on duty towards the vicinity of Rio Pardo, Fortunato, a mulatto who was comrade of Colonel Agostinho; the legal authorities to whom this is presented will not cause him any hindrance, because his passage below the Serra is important to the legal cause.

Barracks at Cruz Alta, December 14, 1839.
